properties.sql:
WITH CONTRATACAO_BCP AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                    INNER JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                    RIGHT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                    RIGHT JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                    INNER JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_BCP%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT"),
CONTRATACAO_NB AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                    INNER JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                    RIGHT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                    RIGHT JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                    INNER JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_NVB%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT")

SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_BCP
UNION 
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_NB
